lead_paragraph: The defeat of all our yachts by a clipper from New-York has excited a grent sensation. They are the very best of all our craft--the best built, the best rigged, the best manned--and they are all beaten by the first American vessel that sails with them, which may not be the fastest of New-York boats. This event is calculated to abate the self-confidence of our maritime population.
